metadescription: Learn 5 n8n evaluation methods—categorization, correctness, tools, string similarity & helpfulness—plus Sheets setup, tracking, and best practices.
summary:
Explore 5 practical evaluation types in n8n—Categorization, Correctness, Tools Used, String Similarity, and Helpfulness  
Learn exactly when to use each method and how to implement them in real workflows  
Set up repeatable test datasets in Google Sheets or n8n data tables  
Track evaluation results over time to measure improvements and catch regressions  
Follow best practices: change one variable at a time, document prompts/model settings, and build strong training datasets for confident validation
